title: Asynchronously Parallel Optimization Method For Sizing Analog Transistors U
excerpt: A new technical paper titled “APOSTLE: Asynchronously Parallel Optimization for Sizing Analog Transistors Using DNN Learning” was published by researchers at UT Austin and Analog Devices. Abstract “Analog circuit sizing is a high-cost process in terms of the manual effort invested and the computation time spent.
